EmailTemplate.description: Email template to Case owner when new Internal type case is created
EmailTemplate.name: New Case of Internal Type
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject} Logged
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName}
We are looking into the issue and will get back to you soon with the resolution.
In order to help us to resolve your case faster, can you please provide us with a screenshot of your issue and grant us login access for next 7 days. The steps to grant login access click on the following link-
https://ffreedom.my.salesforce.com/01520000000hhtG
If you have already done the above, then please ignore.
Regards,
Technology Support
